short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly get walkability scores, amenity insights, and the direct booking website of any Airbnb listing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📍 Location Matters
Whether you prefer a quiet retreat or a bustling central location, walkability accounts for all the differences. Skip searching and zooming-in on Google Maps — get the Walk Score® directly on each Airbnb listing page.

😎 Check What’s Missing
Avoid unexpected issues! Each Airbnb listing is cross-checked against a list of essential amenities needed for everyday living. Whether it's a short stay or a long one, see what’s available and what’s missing before booking.

✅ Book Direct
Use Airbnb to find rentals, BUT book directly through the host's website to save hundreds of dollars in fees. Just install and go to any Airbnb listing!
